thread.section_title: Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastique Boutique Hotel!
thread.title_full: Fantastique Boutique Hotel! - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kim T
title: Fantastique Boutique Hotel!
text: We absolutely loved Hotel La Tamise. Close to Le Louvre and very central for us. Walked everywhere. The staff were so warm and friendly. The breakfasts were so very french, great for families and or power breakfasts as I even had a business meeting there. Hope to be back soon.
